welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Callao, Peru! Get ready to explore this charming port city, known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and beautiful coastal views. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all that Callao has to offer."

restaurants.name: Panadería Olcese

restaurants.address: Av. Saenz Peña Nº 348, El Callao

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for domestic flights only.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
